meanings.definition: One of five equal parts into which a population or sample can be divided based on ranking or distribution.
meanings.sent1: In the class, each group represents a quintile of the students.
meanings.sent2: The income distribution chart is divided into quintiles for analysis.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the cake was cut into quintiles, making it easy for everyone to get a fair share.
meanings.sent4: The garden was divided into quintiles of flowers, creating a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The game board was split into quintiles, each with a different color.

meanings.definition: A value that divides a set of data into five equal parts.
meanings.sent1: The quintile helped us understand the spread of test scores in the class.
meanings.sent2: Financial analysts often use quintiles to analyze investment performance.
meanings.sent3: The chef used a quintile to separate the ingredients for the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The music playlist was organized into quintiles based on genre.
meanings.sent5: The weather data was grouped into quintiles to study seasonal patterns.
